job_description:
Our client is one of the fastest-growing guest and event management software companies. They are looking to bring on a Regional Sales Director to manage a team of Account Executives in the West Coast. They are looking for a polished and charismatic leader with proven success to enter this position!
• *Must be comfortable with 50% travel

Details:
• Base + Uncapped Commission
• $175k++ at plan year 1
• Full Benefits & 401k
• Mileage reimbursements & travel package
• Incredible company culture
• Cutting-edge technology that is changing its space

Requirements:
• Bachelors Degree
• 3+ years of hospitality SaaS sales experience
• 5+ years of SaaS sales experience
• 2+ years of management experience

If this is an opportunity that might make sense for you - email your resume to gluna@pursuitsalessolutions.com !!

Qualifications: They are looking for a polished and charismatic leader with proven success to enter this position!
3+ years of hospitality SaaS sales experience
Responsibilities: They are looking to bring on a Regional Sales Director to manage a team of Account Executives in the West Coast
